desc: Simply natural skin care. 100% natural ingredients with zero waste biodegradable packaging. Great for dry skin, sensitive skin, or eczema. Unscented options. No toxins. Plastic free. Made with certified organic ingredients. Featured items: lotion bars, lip balms, and lotion sticks. Gift sets available.

layout.text: A Dietitian's Garden in Southern California | Healthier From Scratch Cooking | Handcrafted Eco-Friendly Skin & Lip Care
